message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm offering it at a starting price of $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $13,500. This is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
